prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, Drums, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, and Drums, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, and Drums, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This piece is Piano, Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, and Drums, Organ not included.
